data.title: Green Desert put down at 32
data.meta_description:
http://www.bloodhorse.com/horse-racing/articles/94268/top-sire-green-desert-euthanized-at-age-32 
What a great sire he was.  And what a long life he did live.  RIP Old Man.  You SHALL live through your descendants.
data.text:
http://www.bloodhorse.com/horse-racing/articles/94268/top-sire-green-desert-euthanized-at-age-32

What a great sire he was. And what a long life he did live. RIP Old Man. You SHALL live through your descendants.

godspeed - he will leave a nice legacy… a few weeks ago I was looking at a horse and saw Green Desert in the pedigree – promptly laughed at the profile picture of him rearing in play in his paddock. Just thought it was cute.
